H

handleAcceptQuest(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.QuestingController
Handles accepting quests by updating the corresponding data.
handleAccountCreation(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.SignupController
Handles account creation by validating the data and creating a new account.
handleGoBack(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.SignupController
Handles going back to the login window.
handleGuess(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
Handles each guess of the player, validates it, and checks for win/lose conditions.
handleLoginRequest(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginController
Handles the login request by either granting access or revoking it based on credentials.
handlePostNewQuest(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.QuestingController
Handles posting of new quests by validating them and adding them to the tables accordingly.
handleSignUpRequest(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginController
Handles the sign-up request by opning the sign-up window.
handleStartQuest(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.QuestingController
Handles starting quests by loading the game window.
handleViewBadges(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.QuestingController
Handles viewing of badges by loading the badges window.
